actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the tax exempt treatment of self insured workers' compensation funds.
short_title: Self-Insured Workers' Compensation Funds Tax Exempt Status Clarification Act of 1987

summary.text: Self-Insured Workers' Compensation Funds Tax Exempt Status Clarification Act of 1987 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide tax-exempt status to any corporation, fund, or trust whose principal purpose is to function as a self-insured workers' compensation or workers' disability fund.

titles.title: Self-Insured Workers' Compensation Funds Tax Exempt Status Clarification Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to clarify the tax exempt treatment of self insured workers' compensation funds.
